community_about.main_title: A Family United by Faith and Love
community_about.paragraph_1: Bozhiy Mir Church (Peace of God Church) is more than a place of worship‚Äîwe're a diverse, loving family that spans cultures, languages, and backgrounds. Our community has grown stronger through welcoming Ukrainian families and children who have found refuge in Poland.
community_about.paragraph_2: From our traditional Sunday services to our vibrant children's programs, every person who walks through our doors becomes part of something beautiful. We believe that God's love knows no borders, and our community reflects that truth every day.
community_about.scripture_text: "There is neither Jew nor Gentile, neither slave nor free, nor is there male and female, for you are all one in Christ Jesus."

community_highlights.highlight1_description: Every person is welcomed with open arms, regardless of background, language, or life circumstances.
community_highlights.highlight2_description: Our community represents multiple countries and cultures, creating a rich tapestry of faith and fellowship.
community_highlights.highlight3_description: From practical needs to emotional support, our community rallies around each member with Christ's love.

belief.title: The Apostles' Creed
belief.content:
I believe in God, the Father Almighty,
Creator of heaven and earth.

And in Jesus Christ, His only Son, our Lord;
who was conceived by the Holy Spirit,
born of the Virgin Mary,
sufferred under Pontius Pilate,
was crucified, died, and was buried;
He descended to the dead;
on the third day He rose again;
He ascended into heaven,
and is seated at the right hand of God the Father Almighty;
from there He will come to judge the living and the dead.

I believe in the Holy Spirit,
the holy universal Church,
the communion of saints,
the forgiveness of sins,
the resurrection of the body,
and the life everlasting.
Amen.

hero.title: Ukrainian Children Ministry
hero.desc: Supporting Ukrainian families with love, hope, and practical assistance in their time of need.

program1.title: Shelter Support
program1.desc: Providing safe and warm temporary housing for refugee families to help them stabilize.

program2.title: Education
program2.desc: Offering after-school support for language learning and school adaptation.

program3.title: Medical Aid
program3.desc: Providing basic health checkups and essential medicines, including hospital accompaniment.

program4.title: Food Bank
program4.desc: Distributing fresh groceries and daily necessities to families in need every week.

program5.title: Counseling
program5.desc: Professional psychological counseling and art therapy for war trauma healing.

program6.title: Clothing Drive
program6.desc: Distributing seasonal clothing and bedding to those in need.

foundation.title: Biblical Foundation
foundation.quote: Do not forget to show hospitality to strangers, for by so doing some people have shown hospitality to angels without knowing it.
foundation.desc: Our ministry is rooted in Christ's call to love and serve our suffering neighbors as ourselves.

testi1.quote: When we had nowhere to go in a strange land, the church became a warm home for our family. Thank you.

testi2.quote: I love learning Korean and meeting friends here. The teachers are so kind!

testi3.quote: Even amidst the pain of war, I feel God's love crossing borders to be with us.
